mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spider_ebay_url_history( seuh_category_name, seuh_url_md5, seuh_url, bas_code, seuh_type, seuh_extra, seuh_is_seller ) VALUES ( #{categoryName}, #{urlMD5}, #{url}, #{siteCode}, #{type}, #{extra}, #{isSeller} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM spider_ebay_url_history WHERE seuh_url_md5 = #{0}
